code:
# @param {String} s1
# @param {String} s2
# @param {Integer} x
# @return {Integer}
def min_operations(s1, s2, x)
    # Initialize cost and find the length of the strings
    cost = 0
    n = s1.length
    
    i = 0
    while i < n
        # If characters at current positions are different
        if s1[i] != s2[i]
            # If next character is also different and we are not at the end of string
            if i < n-1 && s1[i+1] != s2[i+1]
                # Flip adjacent characters at lower cost
                cost += 1
                i += 2 # Skip the next character as it's already handled
            else
                # If only one character is different or flipping adjacent is not possible/efficient
                cost += x
                i += 1
            end
        else
            i += 1 # Move to the next character if current characters are same
        end
    end
    
    cost
end
